alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 1:50AM PST until January 04 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...From 8 AM Wednesday to 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions in Kyle Canyon and Lee Canyon above 6000 feet.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
